decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted ( Principle inspection report, Ecology Report, 70001144-RA-01 rev C02, 70001144-RA-02 rev C02, 70001144-RA-03 rev C02, Letters from Siltbusters relating to hire of equipment, Programme of Works, HH/STR/RA/008 rev 00, HH/STR/RA/007 rev 00, Reinforcement Details, Wall Details and Traffic Management Plan received on 24 March 2015. ) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The proposed works shall be undertaken in accordance with the reccomendations contained within the Ecology Report submitted on 24 March 2015.
description: Highways rehabilitation works to meet the 40 tonne loading requirements including the replacement of the brick parapets with a N1 metal containment parapets
